迴.definition: to curve; to return; to revolve

迴廊.definition: winding corridor; cloister; ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)

迴旋.definition: to circle; to wheel; to go around

迴盪.definition: to resound; to reverberate; to echo

迴轉.definition: to revolve; to rotate; to turn around; to turn back; to go back; to return; (skiing) slalom

迴避.definition: to shun; to avoid (sb); to skirt; to evade (an issue); to step back; to withdraw; to recuse (a judge etc)

迴響.definition: to echo; to reverberate; to respond; echo; response; reaction
